ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Adventures with Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: ... After getting several resists trying to charm various iskar (AFTER casting Tashani, with a charisma of 150), my enchanter decided they were uncharmaable
ygData.messageBody:
>I learned a couple of important things about Siren's in Lake of Ill Omen.
>Do not try to charm the renegade Iksar. I could not even charm Iksar
>bandits (probably about 15 levels below me). I got 10 resists in a row on

After getting several resists trying to charm various iskar (AFTER casting
Tashani, with a charisma of 150), my enchanter decided they were
uncharmaable
and charms sarnaks to beat up on them.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara Daring, level 25 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
